page.title: 09ETWALL PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is housed in a building just over 1OO years old with modern extensions built on to it. We have one main hall and eight classrooms: 4 infant and 4 junior together with a small library and art room. The school has 24O children between the ages of 4 and 11 years old, at 11 they leave to go to the secondary school. We have several subjects and outdoor activities.We do projects, maths, English,story writing,art and craft. This year our class projects have been Communications, China and Trees. This term the art and craft has been to do with the projects.The other activities are all sporting.They are football, netball, athletics and swimming, we have football,netball and swimming teams but we only field an athletics team one a year at the Area Sports.
